scripts.build: rm -fr dist/ && tsc -P tsconfig.cjs.json && tsc -P tsconfig.esm.json
scripts.staking:createState:dev: env-cmd -e dev yarn run ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json -t 1000000 src/staking/scripts/create_state.js
scripts.staking:setRewardConfig:dev: env-cmd -e dev yarn run ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json -t 1000000 src/staking/scripts/set_reward_config.js
scripts.staking:createPool:dev: env-cmd -e dev yarn run ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json -t 1000000 src/staking/scripts/create_pool.js
scripts.staking:changePoolPoint:dev: env-cmd -e dev yarn run ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json -t 1000000 src/staking/scripts/change_pool_point.js
scripts.staking:fundReward:dev: env-cmd -e dev yarn run ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json -t 1000000 src/staking/scripts/fund_reward.js
scripts.staking:allUsers:dev: env-cmd -e dev yarn run ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json -t 1000000 src/staking/scripts/fetch_all_users.js
scripts.staking:createState:main: env-cmd -e main yarn run ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json -t 1000000 src/staking/scripts/create_state.js
scripts.staking:setRewardConfig:main: env-cmd -e main yarn run ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json -t 1000000 src/staking/scripts/set_reward_config.js
scripts.staking:createPool:main: env-cmd -e main yarn run ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json -t 1000000 src/staking/scripts/create_pool.js
scripts.staking:changePoolPoint:main: env-cmd -e main yarn run ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json -t 1000000 src/staking/scripts/change_pool_point.js
scripts.staking:fundReward:main: env-cmd -e main yarn run ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json -t 1000000 src/staking/scripts/fund_reward.js
scripts.staking:allUsers:main: env-cmd -e main yarn run ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json -t 1000000 src/staking/scripts/fetch_all_users.js
